raw_body: RODRIGO – CLIFFORD TISSA (CT) – Beloved husband of Hiranthie,​ loving father of Chryshan and Rochelle,​ loving father-in-law of Suren and Natasha,​ adored grandfather of Alicia,​ Arielle and Alayna. Beloved son of Hector and Grace Rodrigo (deceased),​ loving brother of Lorna (deceased),​ Cecil,​ Dawn,​ Nihal,​ Sunil (deceased),​ Malini,​ Jeanne,​ Kanthi,​ Rohini,​ Mohan and Cheryl. Called to eternal rest on 12th September 2023. Remains lie at “The Restpect Home” by Jayaratne’s,​ 483,​ Bauddhaloka Mawatha,​ Colombo 08,​ from Thursday,​ the 14th,​ 9 a.m. – 10 p.m. and on Friday,​ the 15th,​ 9 a.m. onwards. On Friday,​ service and prayers at 3 p.m. Cortege leaves the Parlour at 3.30 p.m. for burial at the General Cemetery,​ Borella (Anglican Section).058014
